main.name: Katrina Pei Wen Shih
main.description: Full Stack Developer / Aspiring Student / Dedicated Coder
main.bio: My name is Katrina Shih and I obtained Bachelor's degree from FIT this year May 2022. I am currently enrolled in Columbia University Coding Bootcamp. I am based in Queens, NY. Been with Tarte Cosmetics dev team for 3 months now, I am hoping to refine my skills in coding and grow with the company. I am passionate about learning, researching, and writing code. I am hoping to get to learn more about the tech industry, and opening doors to more opportunities coming for me.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email, this form, or LinkedIn

education.description: Coursework Included: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Express.js, Handlebars, React.js, Node.js, Database Theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Git
(Production Management Major) relevant quantittive course works includes: Quantitative Methods, Statistics, Mathematical Modeling for Business Applications, Information Systems

work.title: Web Digital Development Intern
work.description: Assist web development team in preparing assets, web content, and analytics tasks. Hands-on coding on a live digital storefront utilizing HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript. Work on daily operations and updates within the Salesforce Commerce Cloud platform. Familiarity with the latest web standards, ADA compliance, and optimization techniques. Collaborate with Design and Digital Marketing team on marketing assets and ideas for. Research web trends and gather best practice data on digital experiences. Review tickets with business requirements and apply critical thinking.

work.title: Web Maintenance (Freelance)
work.description: Update latest content and information across the website, upload photos, articles, and other server site maintenance. Maintain CMS and debug possible errors across the web server.
